data_sources.name: San Diego Shelter Locations
data_sources.source: San Diego Open Data Portal / Public Records
data_sources.description: Locations of homeless shelters and service providers in San Diego

data_sources.name: Point-in-Time Count Data
data_sources.source: San Diego Regional Task Force on Homelessness
data_sources.description: Annual homeless census data by geographic region

data_sources.name: Eviction Data
data_sources.source: San Diego Court Records / Housing Authority
data_sources.description: Eviction filings and judgments by ZIP code

notes: All coordinates are in WGS84 (EPSG:4326) format
For production use, connect to live APIs from San Diego Open Data Portal
Some data may be anonymized or aggregated for privacy
